name: 3rd Scopus-Indexed AIP International Conference on Inventive Material Science Applications [ICIMA 2020]
content: International Conference on Inventive Material Science Applications \[ICIMA 2020\] is a premier international conference organized by PPG Institute of Technology during 18-19, June 2020 held in its premises in Coimbatore, Tamil Nadu, India. The main goal of this conference is to provide state-of-the-art insights, significant breakthroughs and future trends in the processing and development in diverse fields of material science and applications. ICIMIA 2020 provides an explicit platform from researchers, academicians, industrialists and research scholar to present their experimental and theoretical research ideas on the mechanical structure, properties, synthesis and applications of various materials. Moreover, this international conference on also covers the innovative research works that imposes solutions for various challenges in microelectronics and micromachining technologies. ICIMA 2019 is devoted to give impetus to stimulate the research and development works in the diverse fields of material science and applications.
